ComicInfo.Title: The Big Ride, Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hughie returns to The Boys after his hiatus in Scotland and is immediately dragged out on a call with Butcher. A transvestite hooker has been beaten to death and Butcher suspects The Seven's Jack from Jupiter. The only way to be sure though is to go see Doctor Peculiar, a shady figure who caters to the Supes' kinky desires.
Determined that things are going to change, Hughie demands that Butcher not keep him in the dark if he wants Hughie to remain on the team. Butcher tentatively agrees based on how Hugie handles himself on this case.
Back at The Seven's HQ, Jack is quizzed about their suspicions over his role in the death. They're concerned that he may be jeopardizing the Homelander's coming plan.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-19 09:21:27. [CVDB277755]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Russell Braun, Russell Braun, Russell Braun
ComicInfo.Characters: A-Train, Butcher, Jack from Jupiter, James Stillwell, Jess Bradley, Queen Maeve, Terror, The Deep, The Homelander, Wee Hughie
ComicInfo.Teams: The Boys, The Seven, Vought American
ComicInfo.Locations: Flatiron Building, New York City, New York State
